name: Vineeth Paul Geever
profileDescription:
an experienced and passionate Full Stack Engineer from India, with 6 years of IT experience majorly in web and cloud technologies. During my career, I have designed and built multiple complex components and frameworks from scratch used in enterprise-level web applications involving cutting-edge technologies like Angular, React, .Net Core, .Net Framework, SQL Server and Azure Cloud Services. I also have the knowledge to discover hotspots of memory leakage and implement techniques to improve the performance of complex web applications. I enjoy learning new technologies by involving in R&D works and thrives while being part of a team and collaborating with others. 
Apart from this, I'm involved in a “Scrap Management” project of which I'm extremely proud of, using React, .Net Core and SQL Server technology stack. This project once released, automates bidding, eliminates the monopoly in government-operated warehouses and brings transparency to the whole scrap market.
